name: tape
description: Javascript audio library for the modern web.
author: Alexander Leon <alexjleon@protonmail.com> (https://alexjleon.com)

scripts.build: cat stretch/soundtouch.js stretch/waa-player.js src/tape.core.js src/offline-tape.core.js src/plugins/reverb.js src/plugins/panner.js src/plugins/gain.js src/plugins/distortion.js src/plugins/effects-chain.js src/plugins/biquad-filter.js src/plugins/compression.js src/instruments/synth-one.js src/instruments/sample-player.js src/instruments/offline-instruments/offline-synth-one.js src/plugins/offline-plugins/offline-distortion.js src/plugins/offline-plugins/offline-panner.js src/plugins/offline-plugins/offline-eq.js src/plugins/offline-plugins/offline-gain.js src/plugins/offline-plugins/offline-compression.js src/plugins/offline-plugins/offline-reverb.js | uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/tape.core.min.js
